articles.author: ELÉONORE HUGHES, GABRIELA SÁ PESSOA
articles.title: Brazil’s X ban drives outraged Bolsonaro supporters to rally for ‘free speech’ - The Associated Press
articles.description: A few thousand supporters of former Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro have begun flooding Sao Paulo’s main boulevard for an Independence Day rally. They're buoyed by the government’s blocking of tech billionaire Elon Musk’s X platform. Saturday’s march is a …
articles.content: SAO PAULO (AP) Thousands of supporters of former Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro flooded Sao Paulos main boulevard for an Independence Day rally Saturday, buoyed by the governments blocking of tec… [+5108 chars]
